item.title: Portofolio
item.description: Experience Summary Backend Development - Java 8 / 7 | Spring Boot | Spring MVC | Spring Security | Spring Data | Spring Cloud | Eureka Service Registry | Zuul Proxy | JPA | Hibernate | MySQL | MongoDB | Apache Derby | Gitlab CI/CD | GitHub | Swagger2 | Groovy Frontend Development - Angular JS | HTML 5 | CSS3 | JQuery Deployment Servers / Environments - Apache Tomcat | Kubernates | Docker

item.title: BLOG POSTS BY ME
item.description: MICROSERVICES WITH SPRINGBOOT BUILDING MICROSERVICES WITH SPRING BOOT — PART 01 - Spring Boot | Spring Cloud Netflix Eureka Implementing Spring Boot based Microservices project from scratch. Here I’ve used Spring Boot, Spring Cloud with Eureka Service Registry. BUILDING MICROSERVICES WITH SPRING BOOT — PART 02 - Configuring routing with Zuul API Gateway Configuring Zuul API Gateway for Spring Clound Netflix Eureka with Spring Boot. BUILDING MICROSERVICES WITH SPRING BOOT — PART 03 - Secure API Gateway | Authentication and Authorization | JWT
